channel.title: Donator Status
channel.description:
I am adding a donator status to my server. People say delta has it already, but mine doesnt. Could someone show me how to add donator status, id really appriecate it. I tried a guide, but i kept getting errors.
-VVill

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Ok, im kinda new to coding, so im just wondering if someone could make a copy and paste or something. Im just really confused now…

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:349056”]Having someone help, and using a guide are pretty much the same - It isen’t that hard.
Just look around using google or the search button.[/quote]

OMFG stop posting usseless stuff

Find the method where its stated what a player moderator is copy the thing and add a string to it

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Not hard, unlessed you already released your client, then you got a huge problem on your hands. Example, if you want the whole Donator thing to work then you will have to tell people to re-download the client that you just re-uploaded. Lol, and if everyone doesnt download it, then it was useless. P.S.- Don’t forget to remove the old link and replace it with the new link on all other places you posted the link. Such as- MoparScape, RuneLocus, FrugooScape, Etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

I understand what your saying, but i would like my donators to have an icon beside there name, i have the spirites so adding them shouldnt be that hard.

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

An easier way is just to add this command into yell.

if (donator >=1) {
yell("[$][player.Name]:command.substring

Lol I just made a rough sketch. DO NOT ADD THAT CODE. IT WAS JUST AN IDEA. IT WOULD BE AN ALTERNATIVE RATHER THAN ADDING CUSTOM PICS.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Ok, thanks just were do i add the statement?

This is my fifth month into coding, im still a bit confused.

Thanks,

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:8, topic:349056”]Ok, that worked great,

Last question, i just want the donators to have a dollar sign beside there name.

I know i probally have to add a sprite and code something

Just wondering what to do and were to put it

-Will[/quote]
You’re right on that.
1st You need to get the sign.
2nd You need to put it in your Spirts or Sprites folder which ever you have your Admin, owner, mod crown etc.
3rd go to Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and put the code

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Spirts/DonatorSignName.png"); Or /Files/Sprites/ Which ever you have.

Read full topic

Go to their char file and their should be somethat says donar-status = 0 replace the 0 with 1 happy playing.
